---
title: "add_header_above"
output: html_document
---

# Plain LaTeX 
```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
dt <- mtcars[1:5, 1:4]

kable(dt, format = "html") %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "a" = 2, "b" = 2)) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "c" = 3, "d" = 1))
```

# Basic Bootstrap Table
```{r}
kable(dt, format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F, 
                bootstrap_options = c("striped", "bordered")) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "a" = 2, "b" = 2)) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "c" = 3, "d" = 1))
```
